verbs.description: so - easy spaghetti sauce [ARG1: this traditional thick pasta sauce] [V: is] [ARG2: a cinch to prepare it] has a pleasantly mild flavor and goes with any kind of cooked pasta if you like use ground turkey or chicken instead of the beef —cathy johnson somerset pennsylvania sauce
